prompt: A chibi-style character in greyscale construction paper cut-out aesthetic, flat shapes with sharp edges and minimal shading, on transparent background. The face is solid black with no features. The body is in a front-facing centered gentle pose with hands in taming gesture over geometric beast, chibi proportions with large multi-faceted crystalline head resembling a shifting merkaba structure suggesting stillness and motion through sharp, layered cut-outs with drawn depth. Hair or geometric crystalline appendages incorporating octahedron, flame-vortex, star-tetrahedron patterns from sacred geometry symbolism. Outfit is unique: neutral grey and dark grey with intensity angular armor-like robes with flame geometric patterns with flat with sharpie-style lines for heat and energy, elaborate with shifting Fire element triangular motifs and ascending patterns and Star tetrahedron emblem on chest; texture flat with sharpie-style lines for depth. Include subtle accessory like solar medallion with golden ratio geometric design with quantum-elemental spiraling energy emanations. Environmental effect: sacred geometric field creating geometric aura patterns around the character with subtle magical essence emanations like flickering flame wisps and ember particles. Emulate construction paper layering style exactly, but make this visually unique based on Governor GENADOL's profile: 'He who only attracts', Aethyr DEO, Fire element, Tarot Strength, Sephirot Tiphareth, Zodiac Leo, embodying the essence: 'In GENADOL's presence, fate feels malleable his magnetic charisma draws life's iron filings into ali...' Resolution 512x512, optimized for layering in Enochian Cyphers game and WebGL rendering with TAP hypertoken metadata embedding.

visual_elements.pose: front-facing centered gentle pose with hands in taming gesture over geometric beast
visual_elements.head_shape: large multi-faceted crystalline head resembling a shifting merkaba structure
visual_elements.body_style: angular geometric body with crystal-like facets, flattened with sharpie-like crease lines
visual_elements.motion_quality: suggesting stillness and motion through sharp, layered cut-outs with drawn depth

outfit.base: angular armor-like robes with flame geometric patterns
outfit.texture: flat with sharpie-style lines for heat and energy
outfit.details: Fire element triangular motifs and ascending patterns
outfit.magical_essence: flickering flame wisps and ember particles

visual_elements.environment_effect: sacred geometric field with faint aura lines

profile_data.title: 'He who only attracts'
profile_data.essence: In GENADOL's presence, fate feels malleable his magnetic charisma draws life's iron filings into alignment.
profile_data.angelic_role: Cherub of Magnet of Fate; commands ember-crowned heralds.
profile_data.form_description: A living geometric construct of prismatic fire-glass, representing the magnetic attraction of fate's crystalline potential. The form shifts between octahedral and flame-like geometries, embodying the transformative power of Leo's creative fire and Tiphareth's harmonic resonance.
profile_data.color_reasoning: Amber-gold represents solar consciousness and Tiphareth's central sephiroth, while crimson channels fire's passionate transformation. The shifting pattern mirrors the dynamic nature of fate's magnetic attraction.
profile_data.geometry_reasoning: Sacred geometry of the Merkaba and Flower of Life, representing interdimensional consciousness and the dynamic weaving of potential timelines
